episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.hook: What if The server crash of '22 changed everything?
episodes.twist: An unexpected turn reframed the problem.
episodes.lesson: Lesson aligned to mission: Empower junior devs
episodes.cta: Ask: have you faced something similar?
episodes.interactive_prompt: Vote: what should happen next? A/B
